frame.name: Self_control
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> actively (yet not always with success) attempts to keep themselves from participating in an <fen>Event</fen>. The <fen>Agent</fen> is usually pushed to the <fen>Event</fen> because of an internal urge. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">He</fex> couldn't <t>help</t> <fex name="Event">but peek</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The Agent who tries to keep an Event from taking place. </def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The Event is the action or state of affairs that the Agent wishes to prevent. </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place </fen> is where the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to prevent the <fen>Event</fen> from taking place. </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Agent</fen> prevents the <fen>Event</fen> from taking place. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: help.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: the ability to control onself from performing an action or becoming involved in a state of affairs.
